scripts.build: bun run prebuild && bun build --compile --minify ./index.ts --outfile dist/agi
scripts.build:darwin-arm64: bun run prebuild && mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --minify --target=bun-darwin-arm64 ./index.ts --outfile dist/agi-darwin-arm64
scripts.build:darwin-x64: bun run prebuild && mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --minify --target=bun-darwin-x64 ./index.ts --outfile dist/agi-darwin-x64
scripts.build:linux-x64: bun run prebuild && mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --minify --target=bun-linux-x64 ./index.ts --outfile dist/agi-linux-x64
scripts.build:linux-arm64: bun run prebuild && mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --minify --target=bun-linux-arm64 ./index.ts --outfile dist/agi-linux-arm64
